page.title: 07ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: There are no{dance halls or dancing {facilities}in the area. Anyone interested in this activity travels to Gloucester or Stroud depending on which side of the River they live on. Locally, Westbury on Severn may provide an occasional Farmer's Dance and the same occurs at Whitminster on the south side. Also on the south side, the younger generation need to visit Arlingham (not in this block) for a weekly{Youth Club}.Many school children like riding their bicycles in the country lanes. Although the River Severn is near, it is unsuitable for fishing being too deep and wide. Adults entertain themselves by visiting{pubs or staying at home watching{television}. It would seem that for entertainment people have to go outside the area.
